top_comments.comment: If you want a *PERFORMANCE* , the one to call is Jackson Wang
jackson wang is the real flex. this man can dance, sing, rap and have a great leadership. STAN TALENT ;P

To watch him dance again.. Wow, it bring all the memories back again.. I remembered the first time I fell in love with him, it's when I saw him dance.. but then I fell in love with his voice too.. And now, everything about him, all the positive energy that he always brings..

comments_since_last_sample.body: He is a very good singer 😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍

Im really feeling the vibe.With jackson and his band.Panthepack.Im loving all there talent.The rapping on this song is crazy crazy good.They kinda give me a group vibe like Kard.Its just To many vibes make me want to.Pulled up on all his team Wang.Like black panther 4every.Im team wang 4every.
